column5: Sorting Days are today from 9 am to 12 noon. And Monday through Thursday from 9 am until noon next week as well or until we finish.Fin Clipping starts next Saturday, February 8th, at 9 am until noon and will continue until completed.If you can help, please come out. It is a great way to meet fellow club members and show your support to the fishery.Matt Luckhart is spearheading this campaign so if you have any questions please send him an email at [emailÂ protected]Otherwise just show up at the hatchery in Kincardine and ask for Matt any day you can help.Evening hours could be arranged if a few volunteers wanted to set up a work crew,Thanx & Tight Lines SBK  http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2014/02/kincardine-hatchery-rainbow-trout-2nd.html
